pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Dart is a client-optimized language for fast apps on any platform.
This package provides the complete Dart SDK built from source, including: - The Dart VM and compiler - Core libraries and runtime - Development tools (analyzer, formatter, etc.) - Package manager (pub) - Web compilation tools (dart2js, dart compile js)
The Dart SDK is required for developing applications in the Dart programming language and is also used as the foundation for Flutter app development.

use.flag: Install the Dart analyzer tool for static analysis
Build debug version of the SDK with additional debugging information
Enable building and running of unit tests during emerge
